meanings.definition: A solid figure with three plane faces.
meanings.sent1: I learned about trihedrals in geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The dice we use in board games are trihedrals.
meanings.sent3: The trihedrals on the table looked like colorful blocks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of trihedrals, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The artist's sculpture was a masterpiece of interconnected trihedrals.

meanings.sent1: The trihedrals shape of the pyramid fascinated me.
meanings.sent2: The trihedrals structure of the building made it unique.
meanings.sent3: The trihedrals pattern on her dress was eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: His argument had a trihedrals logic that was hard to refute.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with trihedrals bushes, each with its own charm.
